## SmithyIntegration class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Base class for SmithyIntegrations, which bind a AWS resource to an API path from a Smithy spec. At least one of uri/credentialsRole must be defined

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class SmithyIntegration 
```

|  [uri?](./smithy-cdk.smithyintegration.uri) | <code>readonly</code> | string | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bindToSpecMethod(method)](./smithy-cdk.smithyintegration.bindtospecmethod) | <code>abstract</code> | **_(BETA)_** If applicable for the SmithyIntegration type, grants the provided API method permissions to use the integration |
